title: Tracker Workflow
description: Tracker Workflow Diagrams are used to annotate tracker workflows with tracker rules for advanced change management processes.

properties.title: Title
properties.description: Title of the tracker

properties.title: Description
properties.description: Description of the tracker this tracker workflow operates on
properties.tooltip: Enter description of the tracker here

properties.title: trackerId
properties.description: Tracker id of the tracker this tracker workflow is for
properties.tooltip: Enter tracker id of the tracker this tracker workflow is for here

properties.title: projectId
properties.description: Project id of the tracker this tracker workflow is for
properties.tooltip: Enter project id of the tracker this tracker workflow is for here

properties.title: projectSite
properties.description: URL to Collaboration Software
properties.tooltip: Enter URL for Collaboration Software here

properties.title: userName
properties.description: User name that should be used to store tracker workflow in Collaboration Software
properties.tooltip: Enter user name that should be used to store tracker workflow in Collaboration Software here

properties.title: password
properties.description: Password that should be used to store tracker workflow in Collaboration Software
properties.tooltip: Enter password that should be used to store tracker workflow in Collaboration Software here

properties.title: path
properties.description: Path to the tracker
properties.tooltip: Enter path that leads to the tracker here

properties.title: Tracker Workflow Rule Namespace
properties.description: Tracker Workflow Rule namespace of used Collaboration Software
properties.tooltip: Enter Tracker Workflow Rule namespace of used Collaboration Software here

properties.title: Version
properties.description: This defines the Version number of the Diagram.

properties.title: Author
properties.description: This holds the name of the author of the Diagram.

properties.title: Tracker Creation Date
properties.description: This holds the date when tracker was created.

properties.title: Tracker Extraction Date
properties.description: This holds the date when tracker was lastly changed before diagram creation.

properties.title: Documentation
properties.description: The modeler may add optional text documentation about the Diagram.

properties.title: URI
properties.description: URI to the admin GUI of the tracker

stencils.title: Transition Precondition
stencils.description: Everytime, a user tries to change the status of a tracker item, a precondition associated to this status transition can be evaluated. If this precondition fails, the user is not allowed to switch the artifact to the anticipated status.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: Name of the tracker rule
properties.tooltip: Name of the tracker rule

properties.title: Scope
properties.description: Scope of the tracker rule

properties.title: Operation
properties.description: Operation, this tracker rule should apply

properties.title: Rank
properties.description: Determines order in which tracker rules should be applied
properties.tooltip: Define order in which tracker rules should be applied here

properties.title: Expression
properties.description: Expression that should be evaluated for this tracker rule
properties.tooltip: Enter expression that should be evaluated for this tracker rule here

stencils.title: Status Invariant
stencils.description: Everytime, a user tries to change field values of a tracker item, a condition associated to the tracker itemâ€™s current status can be evaluated. If this condition is not fulfilled, the user is not allowed to change the artifact.

properties.description: Name of the tracker rule

properties.description: Expression that should be evaluated for this tracker rule

stencils.title: Status Entry Action
stencils.description: Everytime, a tracker item enters into a certain status, an entry-action associated to this status can be automatically executed.

stencils.title: Status Exit Action
stencils.description: Everytime, a tracker item leaves a certain status (i.e. switches into another status), an exit-action associated to this status can be automatically executed.

stencils.title: Triggered Action
stencils.description: Everytime, a user has changed the field values or the status of a tracker item, an action associated to the artifactâ€™s current status can be executed.
